AI Description: Centrifuge is a tool used for rapid and sensitive classification of metagenomic sequencing data. It utilizes a Burrows-Wheeler transform (BWT) and FM-index for rapid and memory-efficient classification of reads against a comprehensive and up-to-date protein sequence database.
Core Features: Classification Of Metagenomic Sequencing Data, Utilizes Burrows-Wheeler Transform (Bwt) & Fm-Index, Rapid & Memory-Efficient, Uses A Comprehensive Protein Sequence Database
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Metagenomics, Sequencing Data Analysis, Microbiome Analysis, Computational Biology
